elements.text:
You've been texting with someone you really like and they're usually quick to respond. You notice that they saw your message a couple of hours ago and did not respond. 

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

texts: I feel happy with my ability to send fun messages.
I'm worried this has something to do with me, but realize this person has a lot of other things going on in their life.
The anticipation of waiting to hear back feels exciting.
I'm upset that they didn't respond immediately.
I'm sad that they didn't respond quickly, but know that I won't feel sad forever.
